well, i just wasted a whole lot of time with one of those skeptics, cynics,=

then i  can't help them.  As David the Tech might say, "Oh well"  sf

ed the Melting Pots 15  year 
anniversery,had a 15 min session with it and =

to our questions.....I have heard from my hom=

coming....So you need too smoke 1 and enjoy the=
 beautiful morning  View....

 I'm just waiting for 2012 so I can get a front row seat to  Frank's

hi=
s car if the world doesn't explode. 
 
And I'm the idiot? 
 
LMFAO!!!
